original_text: And it shall come to pass, if they will not believe also these two signs, neither hearken unto thy voice, that thou shalt take of the water of the river, and pour it upon the dry land: and the water which thou takest out of the river shall become blood upon the dry land.
korean_text: 그들이 이 두 이적을 믿지 아니하며 네 말을 듣지 아니하거든 너는 나일 강 물을 조금 떠다가 땅에 부으라 네가 떠온 나일 강 물이 땅에서 피가 되리라

sentences.original_text: And it shall come to pass
if they will not believe also these two signs
sentences.korean_translation: 만일 그들이 이 두 표적도 믿지 않고

sentences.original_text: that thou shalt take of the water of the river
and pour it upon the dry land
and the water which thou takest out of the river
shall become blood upon the dry land
